Source.Name: indent
Source.Summary: C language source code formatting program
Source.Description: The indent program can be used to make code easier to read. It can also convert from one style of writing C to another. indent understands a substantial amount about the syntax of C, but it also attempts to cope with incomplete and misformed syntax.
